component.name: Trainer
component.summary: Train times application with integrated weather forecasting and astronomical events

description.p: Trainer is a comprehensive train times application that provides real-time train schedules, route planning, and journey information for the UK railway network. It includes integrated weather forecasting and astronomical event tracking to help you plan your journeys better.

ul.li: Real-time train departure and arrival times
Route planning with multiple journey options
Integrated weather forecasts for journey planning
Astronomical event tracking (sunrise, sunset, moon phases)
Support for via stations and complex routes

description.p: Version 5.0.3 with improved data loading and clean distribution structure.
